name: Jesse's Game of Life
description:
Jesse's Game of Life.

Game made for the GMTK 2022

Theme: Roll of the Dice

Like to thank you for checking out my game. 

Its a typical game jam platformer. My original scope of giving the player a bunch of permanently saved random stats (think Undertale) got way to large for a weekend game jam

Let me know your thoughts

Also when you finish the game try replaying with the other character

And to quote a wise cucumber "God made you special!, and he loves you very much"
